tva:BasicDescription.tva:Title: Picture Perfect Day
tva:BasicDescription.tva:Synopsis: Hi LOVES! I hope you all enjoyed this video! Please let me know what other videos you'd like for me to make! Makeup products listed below! Good luck on picture day or getting your photo taken for any occasion! Marié Digby youtube.com "Swoon" itunes.apple.com "Say it Again" itunes.apple.com Please check out my website, it's updated daily! www.michellephan.com ♥ instagram is MichelleFawn ♥ Like me on Facebook! ♥ www.facebook.com ♥ Follow me on twitter! ♥ www.twitter.com products used Lucas Papaw Ointment I usually recommend my trusty Kiehl's Super Fluid UV Defense SPF 50+ but I didn't have it on me. It's my favorite chemical sunscreen! www.kiehls.com L'Oreal True Match Foundation Maybelline Cover Stick Corrector/Concealer, Green 195 Amazing Concealer L'Oreal True Match Powder La Femme White Eyeshadow Maybelline Expert Wear Eyeshadow Trio Chocolate Mousse White Eyeliner by Lancome Lancome Plume Liner (in Asia only) Covergirl Mascara Lancome Blush Trio NYX Lip Palette this is not a sponsored video

tva:Genre.tva:Name: Non-linear audio-video
tva:Genre.tva:Definition: Services where the interaction is based mostly around choosing alternate audio or video files - VOD and AOD, maybe combined with 2.1.1.15 (multi stream)

tva:HowRelated.tva:Name: Recommendation
tva:HowRelated.tva:Definition: The reference points to a resource recommended the provider of the current resource. The service provider considers there to be similarities between the currently described resource and the referenced resource. Example: This could provide access to previous or next episodes or to all episodes (the parent series as a whole). Suggestion to record a programme which the broadcaster recommends because of what the user is watching.It could also point to a Web site proposing related programmes ‘recommended’ by the service provider. A recommendation can be used to suggest content or services or services bundles with a similar subject.

tva:Review.tva:FreeTextReview: This vid﻿ came too late for me, my picture day was yesterdaay :'(
A little too heavy on the blush? And a﻿ little too pale...where has ur tanned and nice glow gone to??!
i dun care if she has got any surgery done. what's the fuss. none﻿ of our business.
Thank you for this look﻿ it's awesome! <3

WHY are you going out of your way to spread rumour and hate about another person? What she does with her looks or ANYTHING is NONE of your business. She's just a makeup guru why are you wasting your life being so obsessed that﻿ you feel the need to make someone feel hurt. It hurts her, even though people like you are NOBODY, it still hurts them to see lies spread about them. I suggest you go get yourself something better to do with your life.
i'm so stoked for the botox/fillers tutorial next﻿ week!
Can you also do eyeshadow colors for tanned skin.﻿ Thank you!
thank you﻿ michelleeee <3
michelle te amooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooo..l﻿ loveeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeee youuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuu
I'm so glad you're back doing regular tutorial videos. Not many beauty gurus do﻿ makeup tutorials anymore! -3

bitch please, i know your just jelly of her face, she has a life but﻿ i think your one ended on the wrong video, take it back before it's gone, Michelle don;t let low- lives put you down ... there just jelly people with body's and no BRAIN !
I didn't know how to﻿ braid ! =(
Hi Michelle! I noticed you brought some papaw onitment while in Australia!! Do you like﻿ it? I'm from Australia and I love it soooooo much! Great video with some amazing tips!
your swan outfit is so﻿ cute!!
i thought﻿ lucas papaw ointment was for scars?
you are getting﻿ more prettier...i think its love :P

I have really red cheeks so should I use the green on my cheeks also I don't like using﻿ foundation because I have super sensitive skin so do u have any affordable recamendations for either of my problems? (Help)
What's chemical sunscreen ?﻿
OMG when you didn´t get any chin surgery, then you absolutely have to do your current blush routine! I also have a﻿ round face and want it to look slim :)
Thank you so much!﻿ c:

T-The﻿ jacket... *ç*
PS: I love you soo much! <3
PLEASE DO THE LASH TUTORIAL﻿ !!!
At﻿ first, i thought your eyebrows were red when you filled them in! Lol x)

Reviewer.Books: Harry Potter Ain Maisarah PTS One

Reviewer.Movies: devil wears prada,last song,bring it on,ice princess
Reviewer.Music: JUSTIN BEIBER miley cyrus,lady gaga ke$ha
Nirvana, R+B, Heavy Rock, Techno, Led Zeppelin.
